actions.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendments (A003) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 185 - 243 (Roll no. 68).
The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.

description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 117-10 as en bloc No. 2: Nos. 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10, 18, and 19.
purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 2 comprised of amendments numbered 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10, 18, and 19, printed in Part B of House Report 117-10.
